maqras.text: It is God how created you (in a state) of weakness, then He gave strength after (the state weakness, then after (the state of) strength He gave weakness and gray hair. He creates what He wills and He is the Knowing, the Powerful
And on the day the hour of doom will be established, the criminals will swear that they did not for more than an hour, thus they used to be turned away (from truth)

But those who are given knowledge and belief will say, “According to the record of God you indeed stayed till the day of resurrection, and this is the day of resurrection, but you, you did not (bother know.”)
So on that day their excuses will not be of (any) benefit to those who were unjust and they will receive the good will (of God)

And We have indeed set forth in this Quran every (kind) of similitude for human beings, and if come to them with a sign, those who do not believe will definitely say, “You are nothing but those involved in falsehood.”
Thus does God set a seal on the hearts of those who do not know
So be patient, the promise of God is certainly true, and do not let those who are not certain, hold in light estimation
Alif Laam Miim
Those are the signs of the book of wisdom
a guidance and a mercy for the doers of good
those who establish worship (salat) and give charity (zakat) and are certain of the hereafter
Those are on guidance from their Lord and those are the persons who are successful

And among mankind is he who purchases (as his) pastime issue, misleading of (people) from the way of God, without having (any) knowledge, and takes it as a mockery. Those are the persons for whom there is a disgraceful punishment
And when Our signs are read to him he turns back proudly as if he did not hear them, as if there is heaviness in his ears, so convey to him the news of a painful punishment
Those who believe and do righteous works, for them are gardens of bliss
they will certainly stay in them, God’s promise is true and He is the Mighty, the Wise

He has created the skies (heavenly bodies) without any support that you see, and He has put mountains in the earth lest it should shake with you, and He has spread in it all (kinds) of moving creatures, and We sent down water from the sky, then We caused every kind of beneficial (thing) to grow therein
This is the creation of God, so show me that which those besides Him have created, no, the unjust are in clear error. (R)

And indeed We gave wisdom to Luqman, that: be grateful to God, and one who is grateful then he is grateful only for (the benefit of) his own soul, and one who is ungrateful then God is certainly Independent, Praised, fit of) his own soul, and one who is ungrateful then God is certainly Independent, Praised
and when Luqman said to son while admonishing him, “O my son! do not associate (any partner) with God. Polytheism is certainly a great injustice.”

And We have commanded the human being to care for his parents. His mother carried him in weakness upon weakness, and his weaning is in two years. Be grateful to Me and to your parents; all will return to Me

And if they strive with you that you should associate with Me (something) about which you have no knowledge, then do not obey them, but keep company with them in this world (in a manner that is) recognized (as good), and follow the way of him who turns to Me, then to Me is your return, then I will inform you about that which you used to do

(Luqman further said), “O my son! even if it is the weight of the grain of a mustard seed and it is in a rock or in the skies or in the earth, God will bring it, (because) God is certainly Subtlety Informed

O my son! establish worship (salat) and enjoin that which is recognized (as good) and stop (people) from that which is not recognized (as good) and be patient on whatever befalls on you, that certainly is among the deciding factors of affairs
And do not turn away your cheek boastfully from people nor walk proudly in the earth, God certainly does not like anyone who considers himself great, boastful
And be moderate in your walk and lower your voice, the harshest of voices is certainly the voice of the ass.”

Did you not consider that God has subjected to your service that which is in the skies and that which is in the earth and has (showered) His favors on you excessively (both) externally and internally? And among mankind is he who disputes regarding God without knowledge and without guidance and without a book giving light

And when it is said to them, “Follow that which God has sent down,” they say, “No, we will follow that on which we found our fathers.” What! even if the devil used to invite them to the punishment of blazing fire
